description:
We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer with 5+ years of experience to join our innovative AI team. You will be responsible for building and deploying production ML models, working with large-scale data pipelines, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Required Skills:
- Python (5+ years)
- PyTorch or TensorFlow
- Docker and Kubernetes
- AWS or GCP
- FastAPI or Flask
- SQL and NoSQL databases
- CI/CD pipelines

Nice to Have:
- Experience with LLMs
- MLOps experience
- Computer vision or NLP background

We offer competitive salary, equity, remote work flexibility, and comprehensive benefits.
